title: Sir, I'm facing problems with do not disturb. How to rectify it
content: I've set my device in such a way that favourite starred contact calls will override the do not disturb settings. But in the recent times after updating to 11, incoming calls are totally blocked even if I set up the do not disturb settings with starred contact overriding. Can any one help
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
